articles.description: Malvinder Singh and his younger brother Shivinder Singh set up two offshore firms in the British Virgin Islands, records in the Pandora Papers investigated by The Indian Express reveal.
articles.content: In January 2009, just six months after the family sold its 34.8 per cent stake in Ranbaxy Laboratories to Japanese pharma major Daiichi Sankyo for around $2.4 billion, Malvinder Singh and his younger… [+2242 chars]

articles.title: 'Public' Adds Cryptocurrency Trading Citing Millions of Investors See Crypto as 'Compelling Asset Class' – Exchanges Bitcoin News - Bitcoin News
articles.description: Investing platform Public, with over 1 million users, is rolling out cryptocurrency trading. "Crypto is gaining momentum as a compelling asset class for millions of investors," the company said.

articles.title: Reliance gives Mumbai its first rooftop drive-in theatre in BKC - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Designed by the renowned design architects Ross Bonthorne and Andy Lampard, Jio World Drive’s elegant, floating façade is inspired by the French concept of Nuage, which resembles a cloud-like structure.
